verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
No regrets, No regrets
For the cup of life is filled up to the brim
Sweet peace is mine and joy

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
That can't be measured
I've no regrets I choose to follow Him

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I've no regrets that I said yes to Jesus
That when he called I answered Him that day

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
I've no regrets that I became a Christian
And turned from sin, to walk the narrow way

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
I've no regrets I left my old companies
Whose scorn the Lord and leave for things of earth

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
I've no regrets that now I'm serving Jesus
To me His friendship is a greater worth

verse.name: c2a
verse.lines:
No regrets, No regrets
That I'm His forevermore and He is mine

verse.name: c2b
verse.lines:
For all earth's wealth and pleasures are not worthy
To be compared with such a friend divine

verse.name: c2c
verse.lines:
I've no regrets, I've suffered some for Jesus
Have known some pain, have wept some bitter tears

verse.name: c2d
verse.lines:
I've no regrets for when and How he leads me to trust His will
Removes my doubts and fear

verse.name: c3a
verse.lines:
No regrets, No regrets
I'ts been heaven just to walk with Him each day

verse.name: c3b
verse.lines:
And beside when face to face up their I see Him
All the trials of life and labor He'll repay
